entry.title: cgoinglove/memory-vector-store: 🧩 Memory Vector Store is a lightweight in-memory vector database for Node.js and browsers. It provides simple vector storage and similarity search capabilities with minimal dependencies, making it ideal for development, prototyping, and small applications.
